department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice

**Title:**
Aids to Navigation (AToN): Beacons, Lanterns for the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

**Reference Number:** PW-_ERD-012-29226

** Publication Date:** December 6, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** February 9, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Tender Status:** Expired

## tenderSummary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is soliciting bids for the supply of Beacons, Lanterns, and other Aids to Navigation (AtoN) equipment to support the CCG's mandate.

The equipment will be used to aid marine transportation and recreational boating safety. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other international trade agreements.

## tenderRequirements
The CCG requires the following AtoN equipment:

* Rotating Beacons
* Omnidirectional Beacons
* Self-Contained LED lanterns

The equipment must be suitable for deployment in a marine environment and able to withstand various temperatures, humidity levels, wind speeds, and sea spray conditions.

## tenderEligibility
Eligible vendors must be registered on the Government of Canada's supplier registration system and have a valid Procurement Business Number (PBN).

Suppliers interested in participating in this tender must submit their bid electronically through the Canada Bids website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

## submissionGuidelines

* Only electronic bids submitted through the Canada Bids website will be accepted.
* The Phased Offer Compliance Process (POCP) applies to this tender.
* The deadline for submitting bids is February 9, 2024.

## contactInformation
For more information about this tender, please contact:

* Drew LeFrank
* Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Phone: (111) 111-1111
* Email: [ dziebelong@tpgsc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dziebelong@tpgsc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
